## Loading the data

This project is so interesting and relevant to my life!
Made a change.
```{r, include=TRUE}
library(RColorBrewer)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly) 
library(ggthemes)
library(scales)

load("house_elections.rda")
load("candidates.rda")
load("committees.rda")
load("contributions.rda")

ggplot(data=house_elections, aes(x=candidate_name, y=general_votes)) + 
  geom_point(aes(color = party))
```
